description: This file defines an interface for a test utility within the WPEFramework, including nested command execution and iteration structures, using virtual inheritance and pure virtual methods.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility
classes.description: An interface for test utilities providing command management and shutdown timeout configuration

methods.name: Commands
methods.description: Returns an iterator over available commands

methods.name: Command
methods.description: Retrieves a specific command by name

methods.name: ShutdownTimeout
methods.description: Sets or gets the shutdown timeout duration

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand
classes.description: An interface for individual commands within the test utility

methods.name: Execute
methods.description: Executes the command with provided parameters and returns the result

methods.name: Description
methods.description: Provides a textual description of the command

methods.name: Signature
methods.description: Provides the signature of the command

methods.name: Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the command

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand::IIterator
classes.description: An iterator interface for traversing commands

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the iterator to the beginning

methods.name: IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the current iterator position is valid

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next command

ctags.name: ICommand
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL ICommand : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIterator
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL IIterator : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ITestUtility
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ITestUtility : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
